description:
Sperrgebiet National Park was proclaimed in 2008.
These shapefiles were created using government gazettes. Where possible, boundaries were created from co-ordinates provided in the gazettes. Where landmarks were not specific co-ordinates, other shapefiles were used (e.g. farms shapefile, rivers shapefile, 1:250 000 maps etc.)
Source: Atlas of Namibia (Ministry of Environment and Tourism) and World Database on Protected Areas (WDPA).
keywords: Human Dimensions | Environmental Impacts | Conservation, Namibia, Atlas
name: Namibia: Sperrgebiet Park
